refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates inverse mapping for the mentioned functions.

refsect1.title: Description

refsect2.title: _SINVM_NAME_IN
refsect2.para: the name of the forward function

refsect2.title: _SINV_INVERSE
refsect2.para: an array of the names of the inverse functions (for each part).

refsect2.title: _SINVM_FLAGS
refsect2.para: [bit 0 - 1 if x > y <-> f(x) > f (y)) This is true of unit conversions in general but not true of hash functions or arbitrary id mappings. If the bit is set the function call may be optimized away if both operands of a comparison are calls to this function. If this is not set, the function calls may only be removed in the case of equality.
